title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: Competency Development Program Through Organizational Development Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Actual organizational development problems can be diagnosed/analyzed and actionable solutions can be proposed
Change management strategies considering client organizational culture can be designed and implemented
Organizational effectiveness improvement results can be evaluated using quantitative/qualitative data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
